item.title: 克鲁格曼说他对利率走向 "一头雾水
item.description: 诺贝尔经济学奖获得者保罗-克鲁格曼（Paul Krugman）说，目前完全不清楚中期利率水平的走向，既有观点认为利率水平会恢复到大流行前的水平，也有观点认为利率会长期走高。【原文：Nobel laureate in economics Paul Krugman said it’s entirely unclear where interest-rate levels are headed over the medium term, with arguments in favor of both a return to pre-pandemic levels and a higher-for-longer outcome.】

item.title: 香奈儿因价格上涨和需求旺盛而销量大增
item.description: 香奈儿去年的收入和利润均实现了两位数的增长，原因是该品牌受益于价格上涨以及对其昂贵时装和手袋的强劲需求。【原文：Chanel’s revenue and profit grew by double digits last year as the brand benefited from higher prices and strong demand for its costly fashions and handbags.】

item.title: 以太币 ETF 因大量应用更新而重燃希望
item.description: 监管机构将批准直接投资以太币的交易所交易基金的乐观情绪日益高涨，这标志着市场情绪的急剧逆转。【原文：Euphoria is sweeping through cryptocurrency markets amid growing optimism that regulators will approve exchange-traded funds that invest directly in Ether, marking a sharp reversal in sentiment.】

item.title: 私人信贷基金罕见地限制资金流入以应对需求
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，HPS Investment Partners 已罕见地限制了旗下一只基金的资金流入，以应对私人信贷需求的激增。【原文：HPS Investment Partners has taken the rare step of limiting inflows in one of its funds to manage a surge in demand for private credit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: EDF 警告称，如果在巴黎刑事审判中被定罪，将遭受 "巨额 "合同损失
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）的法律团队在巴黎的一次庭审中警告说，如果该公司被控偏袒几家咨询公司，在未招标的情况下就将咨询合同授予他们，从而被定罪，那么该公司最终可能会失去国外的 "巨额合同"。【原文：Electricite de France SA legal team warned at a Paris trial that the utility could end up losing “huge contracts” abroad if convicted in a case over accusations it favored several consultants by awarding them advisory deals without putting them up for tender.】

item.title: 纽约梅隆银行警告：随着现金的到来，国债交易将趋于拥挤
item.description: 据纽约梅隆银行（Bank of New York Mellon Corp）称，如果对利率的看法变得更加看跌，迫使投资者抛售拥挤的头寸，那么投资者扎堆购买期限更长的美国国债将是一个潜在的问题。【原文：Investors piling into longer-dated US Treasuries is a potential problem should a more bearish view on interest rates return and force selling of crowded positions, according to Bank of New York Mellon Corp.】

item.title: 新迹象表明全球通胀正在缓解，全球债券上涨
item.description: 有最新迹象表明，发达国家终于开始控制通货膨胀，全球债券因此反弹。【原文：Global bonds rallied on the latest sign that developed nations are finally getting a grip on inflation.】

item.title: 美国钢铁公司指责竞争对手克里夫斯公司进行误导宣传
item.description: 美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.）指责竞争对手克利夫兰-克里夫斯公司（Cleveland-Cliffs Inc.【原文：United States Steel Corp. accused rival Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. of conducing a “misinformation campaign” in an attempt to sabotage its $14.1 billion takeover by Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp.】

item.title: 欧洲大选中极右翼势力的崛起对欧盟意味着什么？
item.description: 经过最近的一系列挫折之后，欧洲极右翼政党的目标是在6月6日至9日举行的欧洲议会选举中大获全胜。极右翼政党的大幅右倾将使移民问题成为未来几年欧洲政治议程的重中之重，并使欧洲集团雄心勃勃的气候议程的进展复杂化。这也将向各国政府发出警示信号，凸显包括法国的埃马纽埃尔-马克龙和德国的奥拉夫-肖尔茨在内的领导人的支持率正在下降。【原文：After a series of recent setbacks, Europe’s far-right parties are aiming for big gains in elections to the European Parliament on June 6-9. A significant rightward tilt would thrust migration to the top of Europe’s political agenda in the coming years, and complicate progress on the bloc’s ambitious climate agenda. It would also serve as a warning signal to national governments by highlighting sinking support for leaders including France’s Emmanuel Macron and Germany’s Olaf Scholz.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称债券对股市构成最大风险
item.description:
从他看跌 S&P 500 指数的观点来看，该中枢存在细微差别

。【原文：

There are nuances in that pivot away from his bearish call on the S&P 500

】

item.title: 纽约市养老金投资 6000 万美元保护经济适用房
item.description: 纽约市 860 亿美元的公务员养老基金正在投资一家非营利性合伙企业，该企业从倒闭的 Signature 银行获得了与租金管制和租金稳定公寓楼相关的房产贷款。【原文：New York City’s $86 billion pension fund for civil employees is investing in a nonprofit-led partnership that took on property loans tied to rent-controlled and rent-stabilized apartment buildings from the failed Signature Bank.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行超越法国巴黎银行，成为欧盟最大的上市贷款机构
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）超过法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA），成为欧盟市值最大的银行。【原文：Banco Santander SA surpassed BNP Paribas SA as the European Union’s largest bank by market value, a title it last held more than four years ago.】

item.title: 南方铜业公司希望最快于今年启动停滞不前的秘鲁矿山项目
item.description: 南方铜业公司（Southern Copper Corp.）希望，随着社会政治紧张局势的缓和以及当局对项目的支持，秘鲁沿海山区一座曾引起激烈争议的铜矿最快将于今年开工建设。【原文：Southern Copper Corp. hopes to begin construction as soon as this year at a once fiercely contested copper mine in Peru’s coastal mountains as socio-political tensions ease and authorities get behind the project.】

item.title: 挪威足球明星埃林-哈兰德投资航运银行
item.description: 埃林-哈兰德【原文：Erling Haaland】

item.title: 海恩斯与布恩公司称，人工智能蓬勃发展，天然气价格将在 2025 年达到 3 美元
item.description: 据 Haynes and Boone LLP 律师事务所称，随着电力需求旺盛的数据中心推动对发电厂燃料的需求，预计美国天然气价格最快将在明年达到 3 美元大关。【原文：US natural gas is expected to reach the $3 mark as soon as next year as electricity-hungry data centers drive demand for the power-plant fuel, according to law firm Haynes and Boone LLP.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司与日本银行在沙特-日本峰会上签署协议
item.description: 周二，沙特阿拉伯和日本在东京举办了一个旨在深化两国合作的商业论坛，包括石油生产商沙特阿美石油公司和瑞穗金融集团在内的多家公司在论坛上签署了协议。【原文：Companies including oil producer Saudi Aramco and Mizuho Financial Group Inc. inked agreements at a business forum hosted by Saudi Arabia and Japan on Tuesday in Tokyo aimed at deepening collaboration between the two countries.】

item.title: 莫斯科放弃出口限制，俄罗斯石油流量走高
item.description:
较高的每周流量并不能阻止波动较小的四周平均值的下降

。【原文：

Higher weekly flows don’t prevent a drop in the less volatile four-week average

】

item.title: 阿布扎比第一银行与土耳其贷款机构的谈判因估值问题受阻
item.description: 知情人士透露，阿布扎比第一银行（First Abu Dhabi Bank PJSC）已就收购土耳其 Yapi Ve Kredi Bankasi AS 公司的控股权进行了初步谈判，但由于在价格问题上存在分歧，谈判受阻。【原文：First Abu Dhabi Bank PJSC has held preliminary talks to buy a controlling stake in Turkey’s Yapi Ve Kredi Bankasi AS, though the discussions have been hamstrung by disagreements over price, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 电网不再是明天的问题
item.description:
在生活成本危机的背景下，欧洲的网络升级很难实现，但政治家们必须咬紧牙关。【原文：

Network upgrades in Europe are a hard sell amid a cost-of-living crisis, but politicians must bite the bullet.

】

item.title: Trafigura M&A负责人成为最新一位从交易商退休的高管
item.description: Trafigura 集团并购主管赫苏斯-费尔南德斯（Jesus Fernandez）即将离职，这是这家大宗商品贸易巨头最近一次高层离职。【原文：Trafigura Group head of mergers and acquisitions Jesus Fernandez is leaving, in the latest senior departure from the commodity trading giant.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚有望通过欧元交易完成外汇债务出售计划
item.description: 罗马尼亚即将完成今年的外债出售计划，出售新的欧洲债券，因为预算赤字超出预期的风险预计将增加融资成本。【原文：Romania is getting close to completing its foreign debt sale plan for the year with a new Eurobond sale as the risk of a wider-than-expected budget deficit is expected to boost funding costs.】

item.title: 非洲天气好转缓解供应担忧，可可价格下跌
item.description: 由于西非良好的天气缓解了人们对可可严重短缺的担忧，可可在纽约跌至近两个月的低点。【原文：Cocoa declined to near a two-month low in New York as favorable weather in West Africa eased concerns over severe shortages.】

item.title: 据说埃克森公司和壳牌石油公司正在考虑竞购 Galp 纳米比亚公司的股份
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）和壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）等能源巨头正在评估对纳米比亚近海大型油田 Galp Energia SGPS SA 股份的投标。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. and Shell Plc are among energy giants evaluating bids for a stake in Galp Energia SGPS SA’s major oil field offshore Namibia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 空头头寸显示中国股市复苏信心减弱
item.description: 美国卖空者押注中国股市的涨势已经结束，资金将回流到中国以外的新兴市场。【原文：US short sellers are betting that the rally in Chinese stocks has run its course and capital will rotate back to emerging markets outside China.】

item.title: 银行正瞄准私人信贷中风险最高的部分债务
item.description: 包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Investment banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are pitching broadly syndicated refinancings of some of the riskiest types of private credit, in the latest sign that Wall Street is trying to poach back business from direct lenders.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 启动申请墨西哥银行执照的谈判
item.description: 拉美电子商务和金融科技巨头MercadoLibre公司正开始与墨西哥当局洽谈申请银行执照事宜，以扩大其在墨西哥提供的产品范围。【原文：Latin American e-commerce and fintech giant MercadoLibre Inc. is beginning conversations with Mexico’s authorities to apply for a banking license that will allow it to expand the breadth of products it offers in the country.】

item.title: 分析师称 BBVA 对萨瓦德尔资本公司（Sabadell Capital）的估值过低
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的一位分析师称，如果毕尔巴鄂维斯卡亚阿根廷银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）竞购萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）成功，该银行所受的资本打击可能会高于其目前的预期。【原文：The capital hit sustained by Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA if its bid for Banco Sabadell SA is successful will probably be higher than it currently anticipates, according to a Deutsche Bank AG analyst.】

item.title: Eskom 延长煤电厂寿命以保护南非电网
item.description: 南非国有电力公司首席执行官表示，为了避免国家电网 "不堪一击"，该公司需要让一些燃煤电厂的运行时间超过计划的退役期限。【原文：South Africa’s state-owned power utility needs to run some coal-fired plants for longer than their planned retirement deadlines to avoid leaving the national grid “vulnerable,” according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 N26 因反洗钱失职被罚 920 万欧元
item.description: 德国金融监管机构对 N26 Bank AG 罚款 920 万欧元（1000 万美元），因为该机构发现这家金融科技公司在 2022 年迟迟没有提交有关其系统涉嫌洗钱的报告。【原文：Germany’s financial regulator imposed a €9.2 million ($10 million) fine on N26 Bank AG after it found the fintech was delayed in submitting reports on suspected money laundering on its systems in 2022.】

item.title: Ares 预计到 2028 年管理资产将超过 7,500 亿美元
item.description: 战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp）公布了一系列新的财务目标，预计到 2028 年底，该公司管理的资产将增长 75% 以上，超过 7500 亿美元。【原文：Ares Management Corp., unveiling a fresh slate of financial targets, predicted it will boost assets under management more than 75% to surpass $750 billion by the end of 2028.】
